course_title: Administrative Law: The Law of Federal Agencies
course_description: This course is a study of how agencies are empowered, the procedures and modes through which agencies carry out their tasks, and legal constraints on these agencies.
sections: Class Nbr: 1249, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Volokh, Status: Open
